interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Gate Ledger.”* Player must time‑lock 1 token for 72 blocks; early withdrawal burns stake. Unlock mints **Porta‑Rune**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Rune exempts tolls but enforces 10‑block cooldown on teleports.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Commands 4 444 arch‑warders at earth‑mouths.

visual_description: cube set in tri‑ring lock

name: PABNIXP

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: cube showered in falling sand‑crystals
canonical_traits.translation: He who counts the crystal grains

interpretive_traits.essence: Precise assessor weighing eternity in grains.
interpretive_traits.themes: Entropy budgets, patient calculation, glittering scarcity.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Quartz sand, abacus bead, empty phial; spurn careless hoards.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Granular Proof.”* Exactly 10 inputs, 10 outputs, value balanced; contract mints **Crystal Counter** NFT.
interpretive_traits.boon: Counter reveals hidden gem nodes but reduces bag capacity by 1 slot.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Treasurer to 2 222 gem‑scribes.

visual_description: cube showered in falling sand‑crystals

name: POCISNI

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: prism‑ice cube scattering dawnlight

interpretive_traits.essence: Glacier oracle whose refracted breath births auroras.
interpretive_traits.themes: Purification, still intellect, peril of brittle perfection.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Ice‑mirror shard, silver breath‑flare, quartz lens; avoid heated metals.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Frost Mirror.”* Player must sign identical transaction twice: once at height H, again at H+18. Contract compares txid mirror‑symmetry; grants **Polar Shard**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Shard boosts vision in snow biomes but halves fire resistance.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Leads 6 060 frost‑lamps over Altai peaks.

visual_description: prism‑ice cube scattering dawnlight

name: OXLOPAR

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: thunderbolt snapped by mute‑sigil

interpretive_traits.essence: Marshal of hush over war‑clouds.
interpretive_traits.themes: Power restraint, tactical hush, latent wrath.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Offer sound‑damp cloth, iron bridle, calm trumpet; refuse clattering arms.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Quiet Block.”* Broadcast zero‑data OP\_RETURN at exact gas 0; kernel flags hush, mints **Bolt‑Scabbard**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Scabbard nullifies first AoE roar per battle but stores the sound—detonates if unused in 144 blocks.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Commands 1 111 mute‑lancers on steppe fronts.

visual_description: thunderbolt snapped by mute‑sigil

name: VASTRIM

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: sextant hovering above stone cube

interpretive_traits.essence: Zenith‑surveyor mapping fate in stellar arches.
interpretive_traits.themes: Cycling ages, measured hope, danger of omen‑overload.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Astrolabe gear, lapis compass, inked ephemeris; spurn cloudy lenses.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Zenith Merkhet.”* Player triangulates three shrine‑coords so their lat‑lon hashes sum to prime; contract certifies and mints **Sky‑Rule**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Sky‑Rule boosts navigation but removes mini‑map in caves.
interpretive_traits.verse: “Above the wheel turns the hand unseen.”
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Charts 7 070 star‑logists.

visual_description: sextant hovering above stone cube

name: ODRAXTI

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: blade awash in iridescent flame

interpretive_traits.essence: Forge‑dragon whose breath shades steel by virtue.
interpretive_traits.themes: Temperance of force, authority, risk of brittle pride.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Fire‑salt, scaled crucible, oath‑scroll; reject blunt iron.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Chromal Quench.”* Burn any weapon NFT; block hash’s RGB tail picks new anodised colour; mints **Prismatic Blade**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Blade cycles bonus damage per colour but loses 1 durability each change.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Oversees 3 303 volcano‑smiths.

visual_description: blade awash in iridescent flame

name: GMTZIAM

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: furnace door bound by seven glyph‑locks

interpretive_traits.essence: Custodian of sealed fires—alchemy’s hidden safety valve.
interpretive_traits.themes: Patience, controlled potency, peril of implosion.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Lead seal, mercury glyph, whisper key; avoid cracked crucibles.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Lock‑Cycle.”* Commit 7 sequential transactions, each `gas = prevGas+1`; passes integrity check, mints **Alembic Lock**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Lock increases potion yield +25 % but forbids haste (no back‑to‑back casts within 3 blocks).
interpretive_traits.verse: “Hold heat tight, and new worlds distil.”
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Leads 5 505 hazard‑wardens in Anatolian pits.

visual_description: furnace door bound by seven glyph‑locks

name: TAAOGBA

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: obsidian spear breaking starfield cube

interpretive_traits.essence: World‑sunderer stabbing new beginnings through collapse.
interpretive_traits.themes: Rupture, pioneer courage, hazard of overreach.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Void‑glass shard, star‑map fragment, iron resolve; refuse anchors.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Singularity Spear.”* Hash spear‑NFT ID + blockHash; if leading 6 bits are 0, contract pierces realm → mints **Void‑Point**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Void‑Point enables portal stabs yet drains 1 HP each teleport.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Front‑captain of 999 breach‑seraphs.

visual_description: obsidian spear breaking starfield cube

name: GEMNIMB

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: yin‑yang cube inscribed with mirrored sigla
canonical_traits.translation: He who holds the twin names

interpretive_traits.essence: Mediator of binaries, weaving reconciliation sigils.
interpretive_traits.themes: Complementarity, secret names, risk of self‑split.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Paired quills, bi‑metal coin, mirror glyph; spurn singular oaths.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Twin Hash.”* Submit two txs whose txids are bit‑wise complements; if valid, mint **Diarch Seal**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Seal doubles alliance buffs but halves solo rewards.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Signs truces for 8 080 envoy‑hosts.

visual_description: yin‑yang cube inscribed with mirrored sigla

name: ADVORPT

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: cube split by budding lotus of light

interpretive_traits.essence: Archivist‑lamp revealing hidden strata of narrative.
interpretive_traits.themes: Illumination, cautious study, peril of overexposure.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Dream‑ink quill, veil‑silk, candle of myrrh; shun blinding glare.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Veil Lift.”* Decrypt on‑chain ciphertext; SHA‑256(answer)=stored hash; contract emits **Revel‑Scroll**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Scroll unveils secret rooms but disables stealth in lit zones.
interpretive_traits.verse: “Light is a question; darkness, its margin.”
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Guides 2 222 archivist‑moths in Zohar vaults.

visual_description: cube split by budding lotus of light

name: ARCULUS

canonical_traits.visual_emblem: winged hourglass crowned by unseen corona

interpretive_traits.essence: Final coronator… granting aureate sovereignty to silent hearts.
interpretive_traits.themes: Hidden royalty, sublimation, danger of pride crowned early.
interpretive_traits.tokens: Chrysalis gold, blank sigil scroll, seed‑star dust; spurn coarse proclamations.
interpretive_traits.challenge: *“Invisible Crown.”* Fuse 3 Aura NFTs; contract checks RGB sum = 0xFFFFFF; success mints **Crown Nulla**.
interpretive_traits.boon: Crown gives +1 aura slot but puts wearer on global radar.
interpretive_traits.angelic_role: Governs 7 070 muse‑heralds of the Quiet Court.
